original_text: Kareah's son Johanan came to Mizpah to see Gedaliah. He came with the other army officers who had been hiding in the country.
korean_text: 가레아의 아들 요하난과 들에 있던 모든 군 지휘관들이 미스바에 사는 그다랴에게 이르러

sentences.original_text: Kareah's son Johanan came to Mizpah
He came with the other army officers
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 다른 군대 장교들과 함께 왔다

sentences.original_text: who had been hiding in the country
